snippet.title: Stonefly | Announcement Trailer | MWM Interactive
snippet.description:
Flight School Studio and MWM Interactive present the first trailer for Stonefly, an
all-new game from the makers of Creature in the Well, coming in 2021. Harness the wind and soar through the wilderness in a chill and tranquil action-adventure game about self-discovery, legacy, and belonging. Glide your mech strategically among beautiful flora and dangerous fauna, confronting hungry bugs, adventures, and memorable characters.

Visit the Official Website: https://stoneflygame.com/
Want to stay up to date with the game? Wishlist it on Steam here: https://bit.ly/3k5G5OH
Join us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/flightschoolstudio

Follow Flight School Studio
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/flightschoolstudio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/flightschoolstudio/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/flightschoolhq
Official Website: https://flightschoolstudio.com/

Follow MWM Interactive
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mwminteractive/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mwminteractive
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/mwminteractive/
Official Website: http://mwmi.com
